t: Amazon.com: Serious Ties - Extra Heavy Duty Cable Ties (50 Pcs, 24 Inch/175Lbs/UV Black) : Electronics
s: Update May 2017: I got my new order in of a different brand and they're a world better. The plastic is softer -- malleable -- you can bend them without breaking them. I even tried bending one sharply in half like the review video for this one and while the plastic discolored a little, it did not break and it went back to mostly straight when released. Dropping review here to one star. I highly advise skipping these "serious ties...
